title: Catalyst - Rapid Funding Mechanisms
description: どうすれば、透明性があり、説明責任を果たし、安全な方法で、カルダノトレジャリーの資金をより迅速に分配することができるか？

f6_assessments.q0:
The slowness of the thorough Fund-based approach has been seen as a hindrance for some time already. 

This could be likened to the overkill security provided by Bitcoin network and then introducing Lightning Network for rapid low-cost payments. You shouldn't need a copy of the entire blockchain to get a cup of coffee. Likewise you shouldn't need to go through all the gates to get a little bit of funding for something that can be done today.
f6_assessments.q1:
A very well thought out challenge proposal.

Perhaps you could add: "What other funding sources can this proposal utilize?". Would it be possible to use e.g. matching-funding where $1,000 USD from Catalyst is matched by a partner network, totaling to $2,000 USD.
f6_assessments.q2:
KPIs are well thought out.

This challenge will hopefully lead to a limited number of complementary approaches to cover smaller and more acute funding needs.

My only question is: will this $250,000 be a one-time challenge or will this aim to establish sustainable long-term mechanisms for rapid funding?

f6_assessments.q0:
Speeding up the funding process so that projects can get underway faster aligns with the Cardano mission of growing the global Cardano community.
The current funding process has many flaws that are leading to poor untimely decisions on the allocation of resources. For the desired rapid growth required to reach a billion users it is essential that the funding process be improved. 
I strongly agree this challenge is critical to achieve Cardano's mission.
f6_assessments.q1:
The community has a strong desire to innovate faster as there are many urgent global issues to solve from climate change, poverty, inequality or even new gaming experiences. The community has the capacity and the will to make change happen faster. The budget is modest for the potential impact of this challenge.
I strongly agree that the Catalyst community has the capacity to address the challenge.
f6_assessments.q2:
The success criteria are relevant to the challenge question.
The key metrics are relevant to the success criteria and measurable.  
I  strongly agree that the success criteria and suggested metrics are set correctly to measure progress in addressing the challenge.

importance: Catalystは、コミュニティの継続的な活動に依存しているため、迅速な資金調達により、仕事や個人的なニーズをより幅広くサポートすることができます。
success: Project Catalystのガイドラインに沿って、提案者に持続的な経済的価値を提供する迅速なCatalystの資金調達メカニズムを導入しました。
